title: BelleVie Black Pre-seasoned Cast Iron Mini Dutch Oven, Dia 4" x H 2", 8 1/2 Oz."
features: Mini Size for Table Service Side Dishes.
Lid with stainless steel knob included.
Cast iron maintains the heat throughout the meal.
description: Ready for side dishes, the black version of these cast-iron mini Dutch ovens is a non-coated, pre-seasoned piece, therefore it will need to be kept dry after use to avoid rusting. The enameled white version will require soft handling to avoid chipping. Induction ready, the lid is included, and the knob is made of stainless steel.
